thread.title: Jeremy McConnell is being investigated by police over claims he assaulted a woman in Liverpool
thread.title_full: Jeremy McConnell is being investigated by police over claims he assaulted a woman in Liverpool

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Jeremy McConnell is being investigated by police over claims he assaulted a woman in Liverpool
text:
Jeremy McConnell is being investigated by police over claims he assaulted a woman in Liverpool The Irish model may now be questioned by Merseyside Police after the alleged incident Share Jeremy McConnell may be questioned by police (Photo: Rex Features) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jeremy McConnell is being investigated by police over allegations that he assaulted a woman in Liverpool. 
The complaint was made last Sunday when the alleged victim gave a statement to police. 
A police spokesperson told Mirror Online: “Merseyside Police can confirm a report was received of an assault at a property on Thursday 9 March. 
“Officers were contacted on Sunday, 12 March and an investigation into the incident is on-going. At this time no arrests have been made.” Jeremy may now be questioned by police (Photo: INstagram) 
A representative for Jeremy told Mirror Online: "Jeremy denies any wrong doing, however he is fully cooperating with the police in their investigations" 
He recently made a huge commitment to his young son by trading his native Ireland for Liverpool. 
But following the tragic loss of both his father and his aunt - in the space of mere days - Jeremy McConnell jetted back home for "space" as his relationship with ex Stephanie Davis has become "strained" once more. 
According to The Sun , the former Celebrity Big Brother star, 26, has temporarily left the city so that he can spend some time with close friends and family in Ireland. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Stephanie Davis posts adorable Instagram with son Caben Share this video Watch Next Jeremy McConnell (pictured earlier this month) has reportedly flown back to Ireland to grieve for his late father and aunt (Photo: www.icelebtv.com) 
A source told the newspaper: "Jeremy has temporarily left Liverpool – where he’s been renting a flat nearby Stephanie’s home – to be with close friends and family in Ireland. 
“He needs the support of loved ones during this tough time and has headed home so he can have space to properly grieve." 
They insider added that it's been an "incredibly stressful" time for the tattooed model, adding his repaired relationship with the mother of his child has suffered. His reportedly temporary departure comes as his relationship with ex Stephanie Davis is ;under strain' (Photo: FameFlynet) 
“As a result his relationship with Stephanie has become strained again but hopefully some time apart will do them both good,” the source admitted. 
Mirror Celeb has contacted a representative of Jeremy for comment on the matter. 
The news comes as Jeremy and his family have suffered the heartache of losing his aunt - just days after he had buried his father, Eugene Cooke, last week. Jeremy moved to Liverpool earlier this month so he could be closer to his son, Caben Albi (Photo: jeremymcconnellcooke/Instagram) 
His aunt's death was the latest in a string of devastating deaths in his family after previously suffering the loss of both his mother and sister - something he opened up about during his stint on CBB . 
Last week Stephanie was by Jeremy's side as they attended the funeral of his father in Baldoyle, Dublin. 
Their former flames - who share baby boy Caben Albi - have recently made efforts to rekindle their famously toxic relationship - with Jeremy even moving to Liverpool so he can be closer to his two-month-old son. Like us on Facebook
